meta.fee_euro_approx: Free (Visa Waiver until Dec 31, 2024) - MDAC Registration Required

add.title: MDAC Confirmation
add.description: Malaysia Digital Arrival Card (MDAC) must be filled 3 days before arrival.

steps_flow.title: Fill MDAC
steps_flow.description: Complete the Malaysia Digital Arrival Card online 3 days prior to travel.

steps_flow.title: Travel
steps_flow.description: Fly to Malaysia. Show MDAC, Passport, and Return Ticket at immigration.
